content.query:
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[IngestionWatermark]
(
    SourceName   NVARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    FileName     NVARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
    LastModified DATETIME2 NULL,
    LoadDate     DATETIME2 NULL,
    CONSTRAINT PK_IngestionWatermark 
        PRIMARY KEY NONCLUSTERED (SourceName, FileName) NOT ENFORCED
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH(SourceName),
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
);
GO
